achievements.label: A SOLDIER UNTO ETERNITY
achievements.descriptionLocked: I am war, and war is me.
achievements.descriptionUnlocked: I am war, and war is me.
achievements.unlockMessage:
<i>I am war, and war is me.<i>

[At Stalingrad, you became a Name of the Colonel.]

achievements.label: HERO OF THE SOVIET UNION
achievements.descriptionLocked: They nailed medals to my chest and pinned me to the highest office they could find.
achievements.descriptionUnlocked: They nailed medals to my chest and pinned me to the highest office they could find.
achievements.unlockMessage:
<i>They nailed medals to my chest and pinned me to the highest office they could find.<i>

[You fought an exceptional campaign, survived the Battle of Stalingrad, and grew old enough to tire of peace.]

achievements.label: A CAREER SOLDIER
achievements.descriptionLocked: If you're interested in victory, you know our price. You won't regret doing business with us.
achievements.descriptionUnlocked: If you're interested in victory, you know our price. You won't regret doing business with us.
achievements.unlockMessage:
<i>If you're interested in victory, you know our price. You won't regret doing business with us.<i>

[You fought a diligent campaign, survived the Battle of Stalingrad, and found you could never really leave soldiering behind.]

achievements.label: WITH DUE HONOURS
achievements.descriptionLocked: Ah, don't waste my time any more, boy. You want to cross another name from the list.
achievements.descriptionUnlocked: Ah, don't waste my time any more, boy. You want to cross another name from the list.
achievements.unlockMessage:
<i>Ah, don't waste my time any more, boy. You want to cross another name from the list.<i>

[You fought a crude campaign, survived the Battle of Stalingrad, and were forgotten and purged by your countrymen ten years later.]

achievements.label: FIFTY-MILLION
achievements.unlockMessage:
<i>I fell in battle.<i>

[You suffered five Wounds and Debilitations, and perished.]

achievements.label: THE LIGHT HAS GONE
achievements.descriptionLocked: My spirit broke. Now nothing matters.
achievements.descriptionUnlocked: My spirit broke. Now nothing matters.
achievements.unlockMessage:
<i>My spirit broke. Now nothing matters.<i>

[You suffered five Traumas, and lost the will to go on.]

achievements.label: DERELICTION OF DUTY
achievements.descriptionLocked: I will not be found. I will not be remembered.
achievements.descriptionUnlocked: I will not be found. I will not be remembered.
achievements.unlockMessage:
<i>I will not be found. I will not be remembered.<i>

[You were late to your duel, and the Edge-Hours punished you for it.]

achievements.label: MOUSE AND LION
achievements.descriptionLocked: I met a terrifying foe in single combat, and drew his blood in sight of the old gods.
achievements.descriptionUnlocked: I met a terrifying foe in single combat, and drew his blood in sight of the old gods.
achievements.unlockMessage:
<i>I met a terrifying foe in single combat, and drew his blood in sight of the old gods.<i>

[You challenged the Edge-Long called Warmaker to a duel, and won.]

achievements.label: AN OLD WOLF SURRENDERS
achievements.descriptionLocked: I brought a terrifying foe to his knees, and forced his surrender in sight of the old gods.
achievements.descriptionUnlocked: I brought a terrifying foe to his knees, and forced his surrender in sight of the old gods.
achievements.unlockMessage:
<i>I brought a terrifying foe to his knees, and forced his surrender in sight of the old gods.<i>

[You fought the Edge-Long called Iron-Eater until he could fight no more.]
